doc.title: Lou Grant

credit.role: Carla Mardigian (episodes 1-3) (1977) (in the German version her character was credited as "Carla Mardigian")

doc.plot: After everyone on the "Mary Tyler Moore Show" got fired, Lou Grant went to Los Angeles and became city editor of the L.A. Tribune, owned by Mrs. Pynchon, with whom Lou often has loud but sympathetic arguments. Lots of social causes and interpersonal relationships.
